channel.title: How Do I Change The Starting Pos?
channel.description:
Hey all,
I am in the process of making a V2 for my source, but I don't exactly know what to search for so I can change the X and Y position for people that first log in. I have the X and Y set for Edgeville but I don't know where in the client.java it is to change the starting position! Could someone tell me how to change this?
Thank you in advance. - 1 Pk3r 1

item.title: How Do I Change The Starting Pos?
item.dc:creator: @1_Pk3r_1 1 Pk3r 1
item.description:
@1_Pk3r_1 wrote:

Ok I’ll try this, thank you.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 01, 2009, 11:11:54 am[/size][hr]Hey, Cod3r Chris. It still says, “Erorr Connecting To Server”.

Read full topic

item.title: How Do I Change The Starting Pos?
item.dc:creator: @cod3r_chris cod3r chris
item.description:
@cod3r_chris wrote:

Try logging in with 127.0.0.1
If that doesn’t work, then try compiling ur server to find out the problem…

Read full topic

item.title: How Do I Change The Starting Pos?
item.dc:creator: @1_Pk3r_1 1 Pk3r 1
item.description:
@1_Pk3r_1 wrote:

Eh, but the problem is I can’t log into my source right now to find out the current X and Y. I click runserver and it says online so I try to log in, but it just keeps saying error connecting to server. I tried putting in the IP and tried leaving it blank, and tried doing 0.0.0.0 but nothing works! So therefore I cannot find the current X and Y AND can’t take pictures!

Read full topic
item.source: How Do I Change The Starting Pos?

item.title: How Do I Change The Starting Pos?
item.dc:creator: @cod3r_chris cod3r chris
item.description:
@cod3r_chris wrote:

I believe you find the coords that the starting pos are, the X and Y, then write them down
Next, go to client.java
Now, hit CTRL+F and search for the coords that u wrote down
Finally, change them to what you want them to be
I hope I helped
-Cod3r Chris

Read full topic
item.source: How Do I Change The Starting Pos?
